section.title: PyPy support
section.p: Because the Python SDK is written primarily in C using the CPython API, the official SDK will not work on PyPy.
An unofficial module, couchbase_ffi uses ffi rather than the CPython C API to implement the internals of the library, and may be used with pypy.
